quest.name: In Nald's Name
journal: Before she enters the arena, Mylla suggests that you watch every Nald group match closely, as you will eventually face one of the combatants in the final. The tournament usher at the Coliseum will grant you access to the viewing gallery.

You watch from the edge of your seat as the dance of steel plays out between the Nald group combatants. Your fellow free paladin Constaint comes away with a hard-fought win over Franz the Fair, but is left too spent to have a chance against the ever-reliable Mylla. This leaves the group final to be fought between the First Sword and the mysterious Black Lotus. In a quality encounter, neither side yields the other ground, then seemingly out of nowhere Black Lotus claims victory with what can only be described as a sublime shield swipe. So it is that your opponent in the Ul Cup final is decided. As the dust settles, perhaps it would be meet to offer words of consolation to those who fell short, starting with Constaint and Franz.

You have spoken with Constaint and Franz, with the former praising Mylla's fighting style and the latter finding Black Lotus's familiar in its beauteous ferocity. Last but certainly not least, you may seek out your guildmaster.

Though disappointed by her elimination from the tournament, Mylla is pragmatic in defeat. As Franz did, however, she observes that her mysterious opponent strongly reminded her of someone. Curiously, Black Lotus now wishes to have words with you─a marked change from the disinterested tone he took with you earlier. Mylla sees no harm in obliging the man, who asks that you come to the Quicksand.

You chance to witness a tense exchange between Black Lotus and a decidedly obnoxious Lalafell. Noticing you afterwards, Black Lotus gives his hasty assurance that all is well, though he asks that your meeting be postponed. Your business thus prematurely concluded, you may return to the Gladiators' Guild to report to Mylla.

Though Mylla remains curious as to what Black Lotus desired, she turns her attention to your coming match with the man─as should you. With the Ul Cup final fast approaching, you would do well to dedicate yourself to preparing for an encounter that promises to go down in Ul'dahn history.

※The next paladin quest will be available from Mylla upon reaching level 68.
objectives: Speak with the tournament usher at the Coliseum.
Report to Mylla at the Gladiators' Guild.

dialogue.name: MYLLA
dialogue.text: The Nald group matches are about to begin.

dialogue.name: MYLLA
dialogue.text: As you will eventually be fighting one of us, I suggest you watch every match closely. The tournament usher outside will grant you access to the viewing gallery.

dialogue.name: MYLLA
dialogue.text: Now then, I'd best set about my preparations. Let us speak again later.

dialogue.name: MYLLA
dialogue.text: The tournament usher outside will grant you access to the viewing gallery. Let us speak again after the fighting is done.

dialogue.name: OBSERVERSERVICE02573
dialogue.text: Greetings, my ladylord. Will you be watching the Nald group matches?

dialogue.name: Q1
dialogue.text: Watch the Nald group matches?

dialogue.name: DOURMEADOW
dialogue.text: And so the Nald group has been pared down to two combatants! While we wait for their match to begin, let us look back over the group's notable encounters.

dialogue.name: DOURMEADOW
dialogue.text: In the first round, local darling Franz the Fair crossed blades with Constaint, free paladin of Ishgard.

dialogue.name: ADRIEN
dialogue.text: Though the pundits tipped Franz as the outright favorite, the younger Constaint refused to be cowed, tenaciously staying in the game before landing a single, mighty blow that ended the proceedings. Undoubtedly one of the upsets of the tournament, and most upsetting of all for maidens the realm over.

dialogue.name: DOURMEADOW
dialogue.text: By that victory, Constaint booked a meeting with First Sword Mylla, who had predictably triumphed in her own opening match.

dialogue.name: ADRIEN
dialogue.text: For those of you who were banking on another upset, however, it was not to be. From the opening moments, it was plain from his sluggish movements that Constaint's earlier exertions had taken their toll.

dialogue.name: ADRIEN
dialogue.text: Meanwhile, the First Sword was all business. With her textbook-perfect technique and methodical maneuvering, she took firm control from the halfway mark and didn't let go until her opponent was on his knees.

dialogue.name: DOURMEADOW
dialogue.text: Ah, I believe preparations for the tournament's penultimate match are in order! Mylla, First Sword of the Gladiators' Guild, will take to the arena against Black Lotus, the mystery contestant who has soundly defeated all comers!

dialogue.name: ADRIEN
dialogue.text: And Black Lotus advances to the Ul Cup final!

dialogue.name: ADRIEN
dialogue.text: In another nail-biting clash, the First Sword showed her class against an unknown opponent. However, Black Lotus kept up with her blow for blow, and seemingly out of nowhere clinched victory with a magnificent parry!

dialogue.name: DOURMEADOW
dialogue.text: So sublime was the timing, it calls to my mind the Sword of Nald!

dialogue.name: ADRIEN
dialogue.text: Ah, now that you mention it, I can definitely see the resemblance. And with that sublime strike, our second Ul Cup finalist has been decided!

dialogue.name: DOURMEADOW
dialogue.text: Forename Surname will take on the mysterious Black Lotus in a battle that promises to go down in Coliseum─nay, Ul'dahn history! Please look forward to it─I know I will!

dialogue.name: SUSPICIOUSAUDIENCE02573
dialogue.text: Sh-She lost! Mylla lost!

dialogue.name: ODDE
dialogue.text: Bah, so much for the lauded First Sword!

dialogue.name: SUSPICIOUSAUDIENCE02573
dialogue.text: Wh-What will we do? That Black Lotus could ruin everything!

dialogue.name: SUSPICIOUSAUDIENCE02573
dialogue.text: If he ends up winning the tournament, we'd be neck deep in debt paying what's owed...

dialogue.name: ODDE
dialogue.text: Fret not, my friend. We already know Black Lotus's strings. As a matter of fact, we are pulling them as we speak.

dialogue.name: SUSPICIOUSAUDIENCE02573
dialogue.text: Truly!?

dialogue.name: ODDE
dialogue.text: Do I not always say one can never have too many guarantees?

dialogue.name: OBSERVERSERVICE02573
dialogue.text: Such riveting displays from both the Nald and Thal groups!

dialogue.name: MYLLA
dialogue.text: Whoever this Black Lotus is, he is no ordinary swordsman...

dialogue.name: FRANZ
dialogue.text: <sigh> To think that one more beauteous than me should be found in Ishgard... Well, there is naught for it but to train harder and grow more beauteous.

dialogue.name: FRANZ
dialogue.text: That Black Lotus fellow, though─there was something familiar about him. A beauteous ferocity I'd swear I've seen before, but I cannot remember where.

dialogue.name: CONSTAINT
dialogue.text: Mylla is truly a complete fighter, and she gave me nary a flaw or opening to exploit. I can see why she is the guildmaster.

dialogue.name: CONSTAINT
dialogue.text: Well, my little campaign may be over, but I take heart in the knowledge that yours continues. I shall pray for your victory!

dialogue.name: MYLLA
dialogue.text: From technique to sheer strength, that Black Lotus was a class above me in all aspects. What's more, he fought with a ferocious style that resembled...

dialogue.name: MYLLA
dialogue.text: But never mind that. Dwelling on it won't change the result. I was bested in a fair contest, and I shall give credit where it is due. My only regret is that I could not meet you in the final, Forename. It falls to you now to bring pride to our guild's name.

dialogue.name: MYLLA
dialogue.text: Oh, after the match, Black Lotus came and said that he wished a word with you. The way he mentioned your name gave me the impression that he knew you, but then again many people do.

dialogue.name: MYLLA
dialogue.text: At any rate, I don't see any harm in obliging the man. If you can spare a moment, he asks that you come to the Quicksand.

dialogue.name: MYLLA
dialogue.text: If you can spare a moment, Black Lotus asks that you come to the Quicksand.

dialogue.name: ODDE
dialogue.text: What do you want? If you know what's good for you, you will remove yourself from my presence. Right now.

dialogue.name: ALDIS
dialogue.text: You can threaten me all you like, but I ain't pulling out. It's poor form, see?

dialogue.name: ODDE
dialogue.text: Well, far be it from me to ruin your form...but there's a trivial matter I would bring to your attention.

dialogue.name: ALDIS
dialogue.text: You bastard!

dialogue.name: ODDE
dialogue.text: Very trivial, yes? I'm sure you will make the right decision. Hehehe...

dialogue.name: ALDIS
dialogue.text: You were listening, eh? Don't worry, it's nothing I can't handle.

dialogue.name: ALDIS
dialogue.text: Look, I know I asked you to come here, but something's come up. We'll have to do this another time.

dialogue.name: ALDIS
dialogue.text: I know I asked you to come here, but something's come up. We'll have to do this another time.

dialogue.name: MYLLA
dialogue.text: Well? Did you meet Black Lotus?

dialogue.name: MYLLA
dialogue.text: ...Postponed, you say? I wonder what he wanted. If nowhere else, you could always try chatting in the arena. 'Twould hardly be the first time folk got talkative in battle.

dialogue.name: MYLLA
dialogue.text: I must say, though, the disappointment of elimination is swiftly giving way to anticipation. I look forward to seeing you clash with Black Lotus and, needless to say, come away with the win.
